snippet: Andy Murray is prepared to switch from grasscourts to clay in a matter of days to play for champions Britain against Serbia in the Davis Cup, the world number two said on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray is prepared to switch from grasscourts to clay in a matter of days to play for champions Britain against Serbia in the Davis Cup, the world number two said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Says Will Play Davis Cup, Despite Tough Schedule
headline.main: Murray Says Will Play Davis Cup, Despite Tough Schedule
